mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT productName,p.productIdx,a.accountNo,balance,TO_CHAR(trDate,'YYYY-MM-DD')lastTrDate,interestRate FROM account a JOIN product p on a.productIdx = p.productIdx JOIN depositProduct d ON d.productIdx = a.productIdx JOIN transaction t ON a.accountNo = t.accountNo WHERE memberIdx = #{memberIdx} ORDER BY trDate DESC )WHERE ROWNUM =1

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT productName,p.productIdx,a.accountNo,balance,TO_CHAR(trDate,'YYYY-MM-DD')lastTrDate,interest FROM account a JOIN product p on a.productIdx = p.productIdx JOIN savingsProduct s ON s.productIdx = a.productIdx JOIN transaction t ON a.accountNo = t.accountNo WHERE memberIdx = #{memberIdx} ORDER BY trDate DESC )WHERE ROWNUM =1

SELECT a.accountNo,a.createDate,d.interestRate,p.productName,p.productDetail FROM account a JOIN depositProduct d ON a.productIdx = d.productIdx JOIN product p ON a.productIdx = p.productIdx WHERE a.ACCOUNTNO = #{accountNo}

SELECT a.accountNo,a.createDate,p.productName,p.productDetail,productType, entryDate,monthly,interest,vipInterest,savingType,interestType,tax FROM account a JOIN savingsProduct s ON a.productIdx = s.productIdx JOIN product p ON a.productIdx = p.productIdx WHERE a.ACCOUNTNO =#{accountNo}
SELECT lastName,firstName,addr1,addr2,zipcode,tel,userid FROM member m JOIN memberinfo i ON m.memberidx=i.memberidx WHERE m.memberidx= #{memberIdx}
SELECT SUM(balance)totBal FROM transaction t JOIN account a ON t.accountNo = a.accountNo JOIN depositProduct d ON a.productIdx = d.productIdx WHERE memberIdx=#{memberIdx}
SELECT SUM(balance) totBal FROM transaction t JOIN account a ON t.accountNo = a.accountNo JOIN savingsProduct s ON a.productIdx = s.productIdx WHERE memberIdx=#{memberIdx}
SELECT accountNo FROM account WHERE memberIdx= #{memberIdx}
SELECT balance FROM transaction WHERE accountNo = #{accountNo}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM account WHERE accountNo=#{accountNo} AND accountPwd=#{accountPwd}
